title: Ping issues
body: my ping has gone up from 30 to 60 since tuesday, is there a reason behind this? apparently, some of my friends in the same area are also having the same problem as well. I contacted my isp and my connection to their server is perfectly fine. Does that mean riot's server is at fault? not the smartest guy in this area and would appreciate an explanation and solution as well if possible. Just in case people say 60 ping its fine, its actually not when ur so used to 30 ping for 2 years+

replies.body: Did you get this problem solved? Been having the same problem and looking for a resolution

I sort of had the same problem and what I did was connect the ethernet to my computer and it seemed to keep my ping surprisingly low throughout my gaming experience so I am guessing that you are using the WIFI. I also checked the internet speed with and without the ethernet and I see a resounding 20-30 mbps increase with the ethernet! Hopefully this will fix the problem.
unfortunately no, im using ehternet all the time.

A consistent high ping like this can be for a few reasons, but the sudden change might indicate a change in your ISP's routing taking a long way to our servers.  I know you've contacted your ISP already, but we can zero this out by running a [traceroute ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq2)to get an overview of your routing.  

Reach out to our tech team by [submitting a ticket ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)and attach the log, then we can take a look at this to find an option best for you.  We'll help get to the bottom of this so you can have a smooth experience in game!
already did! thanks for the input
Well hopefully your ping will soon be better! Gl
